text: Hagi menina natrenka vunka Reselima asente'naza mopamofo agente'ma Zelza Benzameni naga'mofo moparega uhanati'nunka, tare netre ome zanagenakeno, zanagra kasamike hakenkama vu'nana donki afura hago hake'za eri fore hu'naze huke kasamigaha'e. Hagi negafa'a donki afutaminkura agesa ontahino, kagriku tusi agesa nentahino, nankna hu'na mofavreni'a kegahue huno nehuno mani'ne.
